description: Detects programs on a Windows system that should not write executables to disk
author: frack113
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Legitimate Application Dropped Executable
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\eqnedt32.exe" OR "*\\wordpad.exe" OR "*\\wordview.exe" OR "*\\certutil.exe" OR "*\\certoc.exe" OR "*\\CertReq.exe" OR "*\\Desktopimgdownldr.exe" OR "*\\esentutl.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\AcroRd32.exe" OR "*\\RdrCEF.exe" OR "*\\hh.exe" OR "*\\finger.exe") AND file.path.text:("*.exe" OR "*.dll" OR "*.ocx"))
